Insert a meat thermometer into the center of the roast, then place it into the oven and heat for 15 minutes. Victor Holguin/Demand Media. Lower the oven temperature to 325 degrees and heat the sirloin tip roast for an additional 28 to 30 minutes per pound. The brief high temperature will give the roast a flavorful, golden outer coating. Sirloin tip roast is a piece of beef cut from the cow’s hind section. It is a large, thick cut that contains a lot of connective tissue and not much fat. The meat can lack flavor and moisture due to its low fat content.
